metadata.synopsis: Backup zhent leaderl finds that most of her men are dead, and decides against attacking the Guild.

0.text: Shite. Can't fulfil the contract without a crew...
0.context: NodeContext: A little thrown - you can't stage the coup you were paid to as most of your soldiers are dead.
